meanings.definition: The act of not depositing something.
meanings.sent1: The nondeposition of the money in the bank caused confusion.
meanings.sent2: The nondeposition of the documents delayed the project.
meanings.sent3: The nondeposition of the keys led to a comical search around the house.
meanings.sent4: Her nondeposition of responsibilities weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The nondeposition of seeds in the soil resulted in barren fields.

meanings.definition: The state of not being deposited.
meanings.sent1: The nondeposition of the funds raised concerns among the investors.
meanings.sent2: The nondeposition of the luggage left the travelers stranded.
meanings.sent3: The nondeposition of snow in winter was a welcome change for the residents.
meanings.sent4: His nondeposition in the family vault left him feeling disconnected.
meanings.sent5: The nondeposition of sediment in the river caused changes in the ecosystem.

meanings.definition: The process of not placing something in a specific location.
meanings.sent1: The nondeposition of the vase on the shelf puzzled the decorator.
meanings.sent2: The nondeposition of the book on the table made it hard to find.
meanings.sent3: The nondeposition of the cup in the cupboard led to a humorous mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The nondeposition of the sculpture in the gallery left a noticeable gap.
meanings.sent5: Her nondeposition of the keys in the usual spot caused a frantic search.
